result.formatted_address: 33 Wai Yip St, Kowloon Bay, Hong Kong
result.name: Telford Plaza

reviews.text:
What should we do with your gift?

CODE41 is an independent, self-financed project. We use the profits generated by our sales to fund the production of new watches. Some of our models may therefore be suddenly out of stock while we await a new production run.
If one of our currently-available watches has caught your eye, the time to act is now! Be quick; this gift is only valid for the next 5 days and while stocks last!

The location is convenient with fully accessed by public transportation. A lot of variety shops can be found here. You may spend half day by just walking around here.
When you are tired, you may just have seat and have tea. There are large food chain, store chain, fast food chain, ...
You may also find book store in which you can take a look.
Also you may find large supermarket place.
From time to time, there is different themes displayed to attract people to come.
very convenient shopping mall right next to MTR Kowloon Bay Station

A lady was faint in the mall ,and everyone do nothing but just keep looking  

I ran to the nearby clinic asking for help to their doctor. Luckily doctor ran to help immediately

Really thank you for the professional and kindly assist.  Thx Ms Dr

Well air conditioning.
Toilet with good hygiene.
Many shops to choose with.

result.adr_address: 13 Cleveland St, Causeway Bay, Hong Kong
result.formatted_address: 13 Cleveland St, Causeway Bay, Hong Kong
result.name: simplylife BAKERY CAFÉ

reviews.text: This place is decent. Price value ratio is good. They know how to work the menu and offer enough selection that choices are not scarce. At the same time, they remain good expertise in every dish. The service was unexpectedly good which was a plus. There were fruit flies inside the restaurant though, they better deal with it quickly because that's disgusting.

❝Okay❞ would be the fairest comment.  Food is ok. Service used to be better and friendlier. Price is indeed not cheap if compared to some local and homey counterparts. Particularly for the Causeway Bay branch, I don't know why, be it daytime or night time, it's pretty noisy.  Since tables are so close, if one is expecting to have long chats with friends, should better take such into consideration.

It has a nice atmosphere. A very busy place. They serve Western-style dishes in this branch. Food presentation is lacking lately. There doesn’t seem to be care in their choice of fresh ingredients. Cooking is still nice and just right.

Dinner on Sunday with great food and good service.  Crusty baguette is my all time favourite.  No picture was taken because it was immediately consumed.  Portion of food is actually big enough for sharing.  Baked chicken is moist and tender.

Nice ambiance but very compact place (small tables and seats). Mid- to above-average-priced menu. Typical Hong Kong service: too fast and efficient that you feel the pressure of leaving at once after your meal.

result.adr_address: 香港銅鑼灣加寧街13號
result.name: 星美樂

reviews.text: This place is decent. Price value ratio is good. They know how to work the menu and offer enough selection that choices are not scarce. At the same time, they remain good expertise in every dish. The service was unexpectedly good which was a plus. There were fruit flies inside the restaurant though, they better deal with it quickly because that's disgusting.

❝Okay❞ would be the fairest comment.  Food is ok. Service used to be better and friendlier. Price is indeed not cheap if compared to some local and homey counterparts. Particularly for the Causeway Bay branch, I don't know why, be it daytime or night time, it's pretty noisy.  Since tables are so close, if one is expecting to have long chats with friends, should better take such into consideration.
第一次去，下午茶時段，首先看到價錢牌先吃一驚!!竟比一般茶餐廳平!!!食物色，香，味齊備，賣相亦佳，特別是ice tea，清新有驚喜❤

음식은 기본은 하는거 같아요~ 개인적으로 항상 버섯소스 파스타 먹는데 세네번 먹어봤지만 매번 맛있었어요! 세트 주문시 같이 나오는 빵 샐러드 혹은 수프도 모두 맛있어요. 그런데 남성분들은 살짝 양이 모자라실 수도 있어요. 그렇다고 어디서 또 따로 뭘 드셔야 할 정도는 아니지만~
홀이 꽤 넓고 사람도 항상 많지만(관광객보다는 로컬분들이 많으신거 같아요~) 웅성웅성 하는 느낌은 아니고 적당하게 활기차고 전체적으로 우드랑 화이트로 인테리어 되어 있어서 편안한 느낌이에요. 코즈웨이베이 근처에서 점심 드신다면 꽤 괜찮은 곳이라고 생각합니다 ^^
地方寬敞坐得舒服好靜適合情侶套餐 一家大細都冇問題。

result.adr_address: Hong Kong, Kowloon Tong, Tat Chee Ave, 80號L2-30 Festival Walk
result.formatted_address: Hong Kong, Kowloon Tong, Tat Chee Ave, 80號L2-30 Festival Walk
result.name: Simply Life

reviews.text: Good food but terrible service this evening. They didn’t bother serving any water. The meals didn’t come out together. And then started mopping the floor around us with too much bleach whilst we tried to finish our meal. And the bill arrived before we had a chance to order dessert or coffee. Poor tonight.

Dined here for brunch and dinner before and the food was great. Today I decided to make my way over to purpose buy their bread as they’re known for making pretty good cakes, pastries and I guess bread. I chose the dark rye instead of the white baguette 🥖 and was excited to bring it home for my other half to break into. It had a good crust but to our disappointment, the inside was very light and airy which was hugely unsatisfactory. On top of that, the girl who served me at this location had a very unpleasant attitude 😒 would not purchase bread for here again 👎🏻 not worth HKD $25 for air.

A decently good eatery at an affordable price.  Service appeared to have dropped a bit but was still way better than its Taikoo Shing branch.  Food was not bad here.  I am no expert of cheese so I couldn’t tell whether it was common for cheddar cheese to taste NOT cheesy, which was what happened here.  Other than that the beef burger was awesome.  Unless you are a a big fan of chicken burger, you should avoid theirs.

The go-to restaurant at Festival Walk mall. Excellent food (we usually come for lunch) with fresh, tasty ingredients. Expect a full meal (soup/salad, main course, drink, and coffee, for around $250 for two people). Good service, excellent clean and convenient location. There is a 90-minute time limit for your meal but that should be enough for most people. They also sell bakery and bread without additives and preservatives which is good.  High quality food at excellent price. Highly recommended!
have a good time with friends. we love its environment and services. hope next time can do the reversation instead of walk-in.

result.vicinity: L2-30 Festival Walk, 80 Tat Chee Avenue, Kowloon Tong

result.adr_address: 香港九龍塘達之路80號L2-30 Festival Walk
result.formatted_address: 香港九龍塘達之路80號L2-30 Festival Walk
result.name: 星美樂

reviews.text: 環境👌🏻 服務👎🏻

是日星期日下午差不多四時了，和老媽在九龍塘辦完事便去了又一城食飯，老人家本想食中菜的但大部分的中餐廳都落場，就改變主意去美食廣場草草吃些東西吧，就在美食廣場的入口老媽看見很多人塞在某餐廳的廚窗，她也走過去八卦是整蛋糕哦! 原來就是simplelife, 老媽又改變主意食這間餐廳西餐都無問題呀。攞飛後，她邊等位邊睇人整蛋糕，睇得津津樂道，還不時演繹別人的步驟是點點點…

大約等了10分鐘便可入座，由於還是午餐時段final order在4點半，而5時半就要離座，ok啦！

2人點了兩個套餐，牛肉漢堡和全日早餐，我們都選了甘筍湯及冰茶。
牛肉漢堡: 包煎燶了一些，有少許苦味👎，而中間的牛肉比較乾沒有肉汁👎，但薯條很好吃，外脆內軟👍
全日早餐: 整體是ok的，讚的是炒蛋很滑👍，不足的是多士放在茄汁豆的旁邊，半邊多士濕了，浸到唔脆又淋晒👎👎👎
甘筍湯及冰茶: 是ok的

餐廳的清潔度ok，枱與枱之間有小小迫，伸伸手就可以掂到隔離枱，和有小許嘈，至於服務不過不失合格。

Good food but terrible service this evening. They didn’t bother serving any water. The meals didn’t come out together. And then started mopping the floor around us with too much bleach whilst we tried to finish our meal. And the bill arrived before we had a chance to order dessert or coffee. Poor tonight.
無論食物味道、服務質素、店面環境都比其他分店好，而且店內麵包店的麵包款式亦比其他分店多，不過這間分店的人流亦較多，繁忙時段須等候較長時間。
野食幾好味！不過我覺得個飯有些少，食完唔飽

result.vicinity: 九龍塘達之路80號L2-30 Festival Walk

result.name: simplylife

reviews.text: 一間保持着一般水準的西餐廳❗🆗
菜式非常美味,而且下午茶價錢並不太貴！
圓枱太細，不夠位置放食物。食物尚可，雞肉漢堡肉質太硬，清菜沙律味道清新。
剛試雞肉漢堡、口感及味度失望
地方寬敞食品味道好麵包味道好 在九龍牛頭角德福廣場裡面
